description:
Flixi is a unique widget based Exhibition app for TouchPad. Build your own favorite screensaver: pick from a number of predefined layouts, fill them with widgets as you wish. 

Version 1.6.0 update:
- New pictures source: view stunning photos from 500px.com!

Version 1.4.8 Update:

- Fixed weather forecast for non-US countries
- Improved Google Calendar widget stability

Version 1.4.6 Update:
- Facebook widget!
- Updated Twitter, Google, and Facebook sign-in flow - No more PINs!
- Link preview popup enhancements
- 3 vertical panes layout
- Weather widget fixes

Version 1.4.4 Update:
- Fast screen switching feature: Use double-touch swipe gesture to switch screens
- Bugfixes
- Preview links in RSS and Twitter feeds without opening a new browser card

Features:

- 17 widget layouts.
- 8 widgets to pick from.
- Facebook widget!
- Flickr widget: watch recently explored (most interesting) photos, view recently uploaded images, or search using keywords and tags. View Flickr streams as slideshow, or flick through pictures manually.
- Retro flip clock: comes in two black and white background styles; pick from a number of clock layouts.
- Today's date widget.
- Twitter: connect to Twitter and keep an eye on your stream.
- Weather widget.
- Web page: pick a web page to view; refresh it automatically at some time intervals. Follow world's news or track your favorite team's progress.
- RSS Feeds & News widget! Add your own RSS feeds, or pick from a selection that we already picked for you: follow your favorite news sites such as PreCentral, watch Google News, or keep an eye on deals on Woot.
- Run it directly from the Launcher or as an Exhibition app.
- Preview links in a popup browser.
- Prevent burn-in by using a new "Un-burn" function. If you have configured Flixi with a symmetrical layout, Un-burn will flip widgets around every 12 or so hours to avoid things like clock occupying the same screen space.
